rows.label: qev060202_MSG0001
rows.name: *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0002
rows.name: *fssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0003
rows.name: *fsssssssssssh* ...Zzzzzz...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0004
rows.name: Zzz...snrk! ...I...am asleep... Zzz... *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0010
rows.name: Intervene[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0011
rows.name: Wake Phoskeran from his nap in the trailer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0021
rows.name: Let Phoskeran sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Mmm? *fsssh* I have the strangest sensation I was
just telling someone about how I was trying to sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0006
rows.name:
Was that a dream? Is that what dreams are? *fsssh*
That was my first one. How very human of me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0007
rows.name: Nrk... Still sleeping... *fsssh* Stiiiiill sleeping... Zzz...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0008
rows.name: And what is it you are doing there? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0009
rows.name:
Vigil forfexes wander this area, so it's not the sort of
place you want to be just...standing around. *fsssh*
There, for instance. Take a look to the left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0010
rows.name:
Will you be fighting them now? Good luck to you.
I will be cheering you on from inside my car. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, that was rather impressive! *fsssh*
I feel wide awake after watching that display.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0012
rows.name:
So, once again, what is it you are doing here? *fsssh*
Just wandering the land beating up indigens in order to
quell your violent urges?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod grimly.

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Phoskeran that you were sent to help him.

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0013
rows.name:
May the mercy of Golbogga be upon the vigil forfexes
who fell prey to your terrifying bloodlust. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0014
rows.name:
Sooo...what now? *fsssh* May I assume from your
remaining here that I am to be your next victim?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0015
rows.name: ...No? Horonalderon sent you to assist me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0016
rows.name:
That was an attempt at the "deadpan humor" you
humans are so fond of. *fsssh* Do not, as your kind
says, leave me hanging here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0017
rows.name:
So...what? Did Horonalderon send you to monitor me?
*fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now that I think of it, he DID tell me to report in with
every little detail. *fsssh* But I didn't think that was
really necessary, so I haven't bothered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0019
rows.name:
...Hmm? What was I doing here?
Well, I had just acquired some exceptionally potent
voltant, so I was treating myself to a rest. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0020
rows.name:
All right, all right. If you're in such a hurry, I'll set out.
*fsssh* That Horonalderon is such a worrier...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0021
rows.name: Ah! *fsssh* The one from Primordia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0022
rows.name:
Lately, I have been working to master the concept of
the human "metaphor." Might you have a moment to
chat with me? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0051
rows.name: Stay put and hear Phoskeran out.

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0060
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you're busy at the moment.

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0023
rows.name:
Wonderful! *fsssh* Horonalderon is running about
in a panic and won't listen to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0024
rows.name:
I see. Thank you for sharing that. *fsssh*
...But here is my metaphor anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0025
rows.name:
*fsssh* Let us say that—metaphorically speaking—
a human in a black mask suddenly jumped in front
of the trailer I was driving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0026
rows.name:
He then metaphorically told me he was planning to use
the voltant we gathered to destroy New LA. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0027
rows.name:
Finally, that clearly volatile human metaphorically drove
off in the trailer, which contains voltant strong enough
to knock you humans out in just one whiff. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0028
rows.name: Is that bad? *fsssh* ...Metaphorically, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0070
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0071
rows.name:
Tell Phoskeran it would be very bad.
...Metaphorically.

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0080
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Phoskeran that isn't how metaphors work.

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0029
rows.name: Ah! Excellent. I THOUGHT that might be bad. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0030
rows.name:
Er, but was that a proper metaphor? *fsssh*
Human conversation is so difficult to master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0031
rows.name:
So explaining what actually happened to me in real life
does not count as metaphor? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0032
rows.name:
I see. Hmm... Human conversation is a tricky thing.
*fsssh* In any case, that concludes my chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0033
rows.name:
*fsssh* Yes, so we still need to figure out how to deal
with this stolen voltant problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0034
rows.name:
Because if, for example, that voltant were scattered
about the city, many of its residents would die. *fsssh*
And that would be a most tragic scene.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0035
rows.name: ...YES! That one was TOTALLY metaphor! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0090
rows.name: Endure

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0091
rows.name: Summon up your patience and keep listening.

rows.label: qev060202_JNK0100
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev060202_SEL0101
rows.name:
Stop humoring Phoskeran and
talk to Horonalderon instead.

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0036
rows.name: Unfortunately, I have no means to resolve the situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0037
rows.name:
*fsssh* If this incident represents a problem for you,
perhaps begin by asking around for information?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0038
rows.name:
The BLADE called Piers, for example, is quite close
with us Zaruboggan. *fsssh* If you spoke with him,
perhaps he could shed some light on the situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0039
rows.name:
And by light, I actually mean information! Ha HA!
I am clearly well on my way to mastering metaphor.
My own genius terrifies me sometimes. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0040
rows.name: You have my respect, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0041
rows.name:
Even among the Zaruboggan, there are few who can
stand to talk with Phoskeran. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0042
rows.name:
Apologies. He is always this way, I am afraid. *fsssh*
I don't blame you in the least for being fed up with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0043
rows.name:
But yes, I will gather some people and begin searching
for the culprit. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0044
rows.name:
Oooo! You sound so determined!
*fsssh* But if we're gathering people,
why not go see what Piers has to say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0045
rows.name:
*fsssh* He's probably the BLADE closest to us
Zaruboggan, so maybe he'll have a hint for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0046
rows.name:
Though if the stolen voltant were already being spread
around, that sort of inquiry would be trying to put the
bullet back in the gun. Metaphorically speaking. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0047
rows.name: *fsssssssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0048
rows.name:
...I am sorry. I promise to repay this debt soon. *fsssh*
For now, please help us stop this from happening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0049
rows.name:
He taught me the most fascinating rhetorical tool.
*fsssh* I cannot wait to get even more metaphorical![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0050
rows.name:
*yaaawn* I am suddenly struck with the urge to nap.
*fsssh* To use your human "simile," I am as sleepy as
a cat that feels quite tired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060202_MSG0051
rows.name:
Horonalderon is still going on about something,
however, so I suppose I will wander off in search of a
quiet spot. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
